name: Puppeteer
desc:
A dead creature jerkily rises to life under your control, restored to its maximum hit points. It is significantly weakened in this state - its maximum AP is reduced to 1 and cannot be increased, its movement speed is halved, and it is vulnerable to all damage. It can make one attack for 1 AP. It takes its turn after yours. Casting this spell again ends the spell on any existing targets.

When the spell expires, the creature's body is reduced to ash, consumed by the magic that animated it.
author: CrusaderDroid
